name: Goose Wayne
description:
This game is my entry for Goose Wayne Batman's green screen challenge on Feb 22, 2019. He was looking for an editor, but I thought maybe he would like to have a sidekick with game development skills. Thus the game Goose Wayne is born.

CREDITS

DEVELOPER:
Croben

HERO & VOICE:
Goose Wayne Batman

BGM:
TechnoAxe
TeknoAXE's Royalty Free Music #5 (Super Hero) Suspense Music
TeknoAXE's Royalty Free Music - Intro #24 (John 117) Suspense/Action/Tension

TOOLS:
Audacity, Gimp, Inkscape, Kdenlive, OBS, Unity3d, Visual Studio & VLC

SPECIAL THANKS:
Pewdiepie, Kalan, Dr. Phil & all 9 yr olds
